nodes.text: the artists must be given freedom
they will produce some really marvelous masterpiece
without any limitations, there will be more awe inspiring work from our artists
if there is control over artists' ideas, they will definitely lose their sense of creativity in the long run
when they are given the opportunity to express themselves, most artists will think out of the box and come up with spectacular Arts such as paintings or movies
paintings by Da Vinci and Michallengo are admired even till now
they were not restricted during those times
it is every human's right to be able to voice out their opinions in any ways as long as they do not cause any problems to the nation
many countries make numerous efforts to show that they are democratic countries
Arts is one of the ways that can be used to criticise social problems and government policies in a particular country
the famous movie '3 Idiots' acted by Amir Khan criticises the education system which is chiefly based on memorising and not being able to apply whatever the students learn
human rights is violated if artists are not allowed to express their feelings freely
there are certain drawbacks if artists are not restricted
They might go deeper into certain aspects that can cause controversies in a country
Malaysia is a multiracial country whereby all the citizens live together in harmony and peace
In case there is anyone who brings up some sensitive issues in their films or books regarding any races, this might end up in some chaos among the society
I believe that artists know their boundaries very well and would surely do not want their names tarnished just because of their unscrupulous acts
there should not be any restrictions on artists' work
Allowing them to think freely will give them an opportunity to express themselves as ideas can naturally flow when there are no limitations
freedom to express ideas can bring some negative effects
there are many wonderful and beautiful Arts due to the freedom to express ideas
I strongly believe there should be no restrictions on them
